5f62ff98-c3f0-4cad-8d86-87ac377b3684.description: This is a trade qualification for carpenters in residential and commercial workplaces. It includes setting out, manufacturing, constructing, assembling, installing and repairing products made using timber and non-timber materials State and territory jurisdictions may have different licensing, legislative, regulatory or certification requirements.
5f62ff98-c3f0-4cad-8d86-87ac377b3684.name: Certificate III in Carpentry

1bf78706-c2c4-4f35-8a89-d4625437157d.description: The Diploma of Building and Construction can provide you with a trade outcome, giving you the skills to further or start your career, and covers work in residential and commercial applications. Upon completion of the Diploma of Building and Construction, you will have the skills required to build your career, manage commercial and domestic building sites, or even run your own business.
1bf78706-c2c4-4f35-8a89-d4625437157d.name: Diploma of Building and Construction

74a57fbf-a545-4e09-9629-7e5596eebdef.description: This is a trade qualification for carpenters in residential and commercial workplaces. It includes setting out, manufacturing, constructing, assembling, installing and repairing products made using timber and non-timber materials State and territory jurisdictions may have different licensing, legislative, regulatory or certification requirements.
74a57fbf-a545-4e09-9629-7e5596eebdef.name: Certificate III in Carpentry

6c42ca82-85f7-4a49-a0d1-0c43cee38f38.description: This unit of competency specifies the mandatory work health and safety training required prior to undertaking construction work. The unit requires the person to demonstrate personal awareness and knowledge of health and safety legislative requirements in order to work safely and prevent injury or harm to self and others. It covers identifying and orally reporting common construction hazards and understanding basic risk control measures.
6c42ca82-85f7-4a49-a0d1-0c43cee38f38.name: White Card

8ee980d9-cd6f-4853-8a8a-8c788404652b.description: Studying the Certificate III in Painting and Decorating course will put you on the path to success as a contractor or business owner who specialises in painting and decorating. By studying this course you will also gain practical and essential skills including the application of wallpaper, texture finishes, decorative finishing touches, while learning how to match colours, and manage lead paint and asbestos.
8ee980d9-cd6f-4853-8a8a-8c788404652b.name: Certificate III in Painting and Decorating

skills.name: Certificate III in Painting and Decorating

ecea55e0-f8b2-429e-87d3-93e874644929.description: This qualification reflects the role of individuals who apply knowledge, practical skills and experience in leadership and management across a range of enterprise and industry contexts. Individuals at this level display initiative and judgement in planning, organising, implementing and monitoring their own workload and the workload of others. They use communication skills to support individuals and teams to meet organisational or enterprise requirements.
ecea55e0-f8b2-429e-87d3-93e874644929.name: Diploma of Leadership & Management

324986a9-76d4-4d36-92df-73f8c0abd651.description: Studying the Certificate III in Painting and Decorating course will put you on the path to success as a contractor or business owner who specialises in painting and decorating. By studying this course you will also gain practical and essential skills including the application of wallpaper, texture finishes, decorative finishing touches, while learning how to match colours, and manage lead paint and asbestos.
324986a9-76d4-4d36-92df-73f8c0abd651.name: Certificate III in Painting and Decorating

The unit requires the person to demonstrate personal awareness and knowledge of health and safety legislative requirements in order to work safely and prevent injury or harm to self and others. It covers identifying and orally reporting common construction hazards and understanding basic risk control measures.
992b4782-c3f2-49aa-98ba-1817fcbef71e.name: White Card

f30334ab-0e76-44fe-9c8c-3f5347a91aae.description: The Advanced Diploma of Leadership and Management qualification reflects the role of individuals who apply specialised knowledge and skills, together with experience in leadership and management, across a range of enterprise and industry contexts. Individuals at this level use initiative and judgement to plan and implement a range of leadership and management functions, with accountability for personal and team outcomes within broad parameters.
f30334ab-0e76-44fe-9c8c-3f5347a91aae.name: Advanced Diploma of Leadership & Management

skills.name: Advanced Diploma of Leadership and Management

4e24b9c8-fdb2-48a0-a566-c9a9abee407c.description: This is a trade qualification for carpenters in residential and commercial workplaces. It includes setting out, manufacturing, constructing, assembling, installing and repairing products made using timber and non-timber materials State and territory jurisdictions may have different licensing, legislative, regulatory or certification requirements. Achievement of CPCCWHS1001 Prepare to work safely in the construction industry meets this requirement.
4e24b9c8-fdb2-48a0-a566-c9a9abee407c.name: Certificate III in Carpentry

bc13d052-a554-45ea-9f39-864e2d3789b4.description: Certificate IV in Building and Construction develops the skills to supervise a small residential or commercial project construction business. The course has been specifically designed for students looking to start a career in the building industry. Completion of the general construction induction training program specified by the model Code of Practice for Construction Work is required for any person who is to carry out construction work.
bc13d052-a554-45ea-9f39-864e2d3789b4.name: Certificate IV in Building and Construction (Building)

12bd0315-00c5-4588-ba6c-d8125129edc4.description: Certificate III in Business develops management skills and prepare you to become a valued business professional. You will discover how to manage projects and financial plans, develop critical thinking in other people, and manage the personal and professional development of yourself and others. Commence your journey up the career ladder and stand out from the rest with a qualification in business administration.
12bd0315-00c5-4588-ba6c-d8125129edc4.name: Certificate III in Business

ad93ddc2-6005-4f6e-856f-75da84653f94.description: The Certificate IV in Business course provides the individual with an increased understanding of business services, while giving them the practical skills needed the perform well at a high standard. Upon completion, the individual will the necessary knowledge that provides a broad foundation of business and administrative skills, including the management of operations and project management.
ad93ddc2-6005-4f6e-856f-75da84653f94.name: Certificate IV in Business

7e282cb6-e0c2-4e29-bd35-0549f874e0c7.description: The Diploma of Building and Construction can provide you with a trade outcome, giving you the skills to further or start your career, and covers work in residential and commercial applications. 6ed2410e-05ce-43e6-96f4-5bc185245a75.description: This qualification reflects the role of individuals in a variety of Business Services job roles and may have frontline management accountabilities. People in these roles carry out moderately complex tasks in a specialist field of expertise requiring specialist operational skills. They may possess substantial experience in a range of settings, but seek to further develop their skills across a wide range of business functions.
6ed2410e-05ce-43e6-96f4-5bc185245a75.name: Diploma of Business

80c36757-04f6-4a64-99ca-26ddd165562a.description: The Diploma of Project Management course teaches you how to manage teams, optimise available resources and manage organisational change. It also helps you learn how to manage budgets and decode organisational behaviour. Individuals with this credential develops problem-solving skills and learn how to design and communicate innovative solutions to different audiences.
80c36757-04f6-4a64-99ca-26ddd165562a.name: Diploma of Project Management

b2062678-90c9-4b7c-b8b2-3516029eb33d.description: The General English Program (Beginner Level) has been designed for international students from non-English speaking backgrounds seeking to improve their English language skills for social, work and study purposes. The General English Program focuses on developing our students’ skills through a blend of methodologies combining the best of traditional approaches – a solid grammar and vocabulary basis.
